name: Golem (itch) (badwolf)
description:
Developed during a 48 hour game jam, Golem is a side scrolling action game where you play a defenseless girl in a world infested by goblins. You have a trust protector in you golem. However, he relies on the power of the sun to operate.

The theme of the game jam was based on the following quote:

"Good night, good night! Parting is such sweet sorrow,

That I shall say good night till it be morrow."

This is a very unfinished game. Please forgive all the bugs, and the fact that there's really no objective, or ending, to the game.

Made by Kevin Erdmann and Austin Erickson
